properties.areaDesc: East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt. Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 12:04PM PST until February 4 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...Hazardous sea conditions.

* WHERE...East Santa Barbara Channel from Pt. Conception to Pt.
Mugu CA including Santa Cruz Island.

* WHEN...Until noon PST Tuesday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...See the Coastal Waters Forecast (CWFLOX).
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TUESDAY... ...GALE WARNING WILL EXPIRE AT NOON PST TODAY
